title: Dragonflies
summaries: Dragonflies are small, rare critters that can be found near large bodies of water which have sufficient amounts of cattails on the surface of the water, during the day when it is not raining, and there is low wind speed. When approached, they will fly a short distance up and away from the player.

Dragonflies spawn in air within a small radius of cattails. <linked>Desert</linked> cattails spawn the Black, Orange and Yellow variants, whereas <linked>Forest</linked> cattails spawn the Blue, Green and Red variants. Unlike many critters, dragonflies are capable of spawning on screen.<small class="plainlinks"></small>
Dragonflies have only 5 <linked>health</linked> and no <linked>defense</linked>, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

Dragonflies can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into animated decorative <linked>furniture</linked> (<linked>Dragonfly Jars</linked>). Once crafted, the Dragonflies cannot be released again.

Dragonflies can be spawned by the <linked>Dragonfly Statue</linked>, however statue-spawned critters cannot be caught with any Bug Net, and will disappear in a puff of smoke when the player attempts to do so.
There is a 0.25*1/400 (0.25%) chance for a Gold Dragonfly to spawn in place of an ordinary one.
